DOC.brief_summary: Repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation induced virtual lesions for aphasia.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Navigated Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation According to Post-stroke Aphasia Types
DOC.criteria: fluent in Korean older than 18 years old younger than 18 years old psychotic or psychiatric problems pregnant contraindications to MRI/fMRI uncooperative metalic implants, pacemaker or cochlear implants cannot perform outcome measurerelated task known seizure history
